trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of DataColumnMapping objects, and is implemented by the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref>, which is used in common by .NET Framework data providers.
The IColumnMappingCollection interface enables an inheriting class to implement a ColumnMapping collection.
For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
An application does not create an instance of the IColumnMappingCollection interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits IColumnMappingCollection.
Classes that inherit IColumnMappingCollection must implement all inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality.
For example, the IColumnMappingCollection interface defines the <xref:System.Data.IColumnMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
In turn, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection> class inherits this method, and defines two additional overloads of <xref:System.Data.Common.DataTableMappingCollection.RemoveAt%2A>.
Adds a ColumnMapping object to the ColumnMapping collection using the source column and <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column names.
The case-sensitive name of the source column.
The name of the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column.
The ColumnMapping object that was added to the collection.

Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMappingCollection"></xref> contains a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified source column name.
The case-sensitive name of the source column.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified source column name exists, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the ColumnMapping object with the specified <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column name.
The name of the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> column within the collection.
The ColumnMapping object with the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataSet" name="DataSet" href=""></xref> column name.
Gets the location of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified source column name.
The name is case-sensitive.
The case-sensitive name of the source column.
The zero-based location of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_DataColumnMapping" name="DataColumnMapping" href=""></xref> object with the specified source column name.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.IColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceColumn" name="SourceColumn" href=""></xref> name.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceColumn" name="SourceColumn" href=""></xref> name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_IColumnMapping" name="IColumnMapping" href=""></xref> object to find.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_IColumnMapping" name="IColumnMapping" href=""></xref> object with the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceColumn" name="SourceColumn" href=""></xref> name.
Removes the <xref href="System.Data.IColumnMapping"></xref> object with the specified <xref:System.Data.IColumnMapping.SourceColumn*> name from the collection.
The case-sensitive <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceColumn" name="SourceColumn" href=""></xref> name.
A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DataColumnMapping"></xref> object does not exist with the specified <xref uid="langword_csharp_SourceColumn" name="SourceColumn" href=""></xref> name.
